H0.text: Who co-founded CND with Canon Collins. Bertrand Russell

H1.text: Who co-founded CND with Canon Collins. A.J.P. Taylor

H2.text: Who co-founded CND with Canon Collins. E.P. Thompson

H3.text: Who co-founded CND with Canon Collins. Russellian

A4.text: The committee organised CND's first public meeting at Methodist Central Hall, Westminster, on 17 February 1958.

A5.text: CND began in November 1957 when a committee was formed, including Canon John Collins as chairman, Bertrand Russell as president and Peggy Duff as organising secretary.
